QuestData.Title: Taking a Crop
QuestData.Description: Alright, fine. I DON'T have everything under control here. I spent all morning fighting off virmen. I managed to clear them off of my property, but they got away with some of my crops.$b$bThey took them down to the river, to the south. I have no idea what they're doing with them, but it's probably not eating them.$b$bIf my father wants his delivery now, I'm going to need some help getting those crops back. Could you help me out?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 5 Stolen Turnips and 5 Stolen Watermelons.
QuestData.CompletionText: If my father wants his vegetables, I'm going to need your help.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect.$b$b<Ang surveys the bruised turnips and the soggy watermelons.>$b$bWhat were they DOING down there!?
